definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: incur danger (late) (NH id. Pi. endanger, Hiph. be endangered, [[סַכָּנׇה]] danger, etc.; Aram. [[סְכַן]] id., cf. Levy:NHWB iii. 526 f. De:HL und Koheleth 203; Eng. Trans. 194);—

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[יִסָּכֶן־בָּם]] Ec 10:9 he that cleaveth (logs of) wood endangers himself by them.
